scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --raw "PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 python manage.py runserver" "npm run redis" "npm run daphne" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:celery: concurrently --kill-others --raw "PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 python manage.py runserver" "npm run redis" "npm run daphne" "npm run celery" "npm run beat" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:simple: concurrently --kill-others --raw "PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 python manage.py runserver" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.server: concurrently --kill-others --raw "npm run build && PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 python manage.py runserver" "npm run redis" "npm run daphne"
scripts.server:celery: concurrently --kill-others --raw "npm run build && PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 python manage.py runserver" "npm run redis" "npm run daphne" "npm run celery" "npm run beat"
